org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.populator

Interface BlockBlob

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Populator

    public interface BlockBlob
extends Populator
    Represents a populator which places in a number of 'blobs' of a specific block state. The 'blob' is here defined as the union of three ellipsoids whose radii are set randomly between the base radius (inclusive) and the base radius plus the variance (exclusive).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  BlockBlob.Builder
      A builder for constructing BlockBlob populators.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getBaseRadius()
      Gets the base radius of the area for the blob.
      BlockState getBlock()
      Gets the BlockState that this populator will place down to form the blob.
      int getCount()
      Gets the number of blobs which will be placed per chunk.
      int getRadiusVariance()
      Gets the radius variance of the blob.
      void setBaseRadius(int radius)
      Sets the base radius of the area for the blob, cannot be negative.
      void setBlock(BlockState state)
      Sets the BlockState that this populator will place down to form the blob.
      void setCount(int count)
      Sets the number of blobs to spawn per chunk, must be greater than zero.
      void setRadiusVariance(int variance)
      Sets the radius variance of the blob, must be greater than zero (a variance of one will correspond to a final radius of finalRadius = baseRadius + [0,1) = baseRadius ).

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.Populator

        populate

    • Method Detail

      • getBlock

        BlockState getBlock()
        Gets the BlockState that this populator will place down to form the blob.
        Returns:
        The block state

      • setBlock

        void setBlock(BlockState state)
        Sets the BlockState that this populator will place down to form the blob.
        Parameters:
        state - The new block state

      • getBaseRadius

        int getBaseRadius()
        Gets the base radius of the area for the blob.
        Returns:
        The base radius

      • setBaseRadius

        void setBaseRadius(int radius)
        Sets the base radius of the area for the blob, cannot be negative.

        This defaults to 1.

        Parameters:
        radius - The new base radius

      • getRadiusVariance

        int getRadiusVariance()
        Gets the radius variance of the blob.
        Returns:
        The radius variance

      • setRadiusVariance

        void setRadiusVariance(int variance)
        Sets the radius variance of the blob, must be greater than zero (a variance of one will correspond to a final radius of finalRadius = baseRadius + [0,1) = baseRadius ).

        This defaults to 2.

        Parameters:
        variance - The new radius variance

      • getCount

        int getCount()
        Gets the number of blobs which will be placed per chunk.
        Returns:
        The number of blobs

      • setCount

        void setCount(int count)
        Sets the number of blobs to spawn per chunk, must be greater than zero.

        This defaults to 3.

        Parameters:
        count - The new number of blobs
